summary:
**Apollo, the Multitalented God**

Apollo is a super-important god in Greek and Roman mythology. He's known for many things: shooting arrows (and inventing archery), playing music (especially the lyre), and making people feel better when they're sick. He's also the twin brother of Artemis and the god of sunlight, truth, and poetry. People often went to him for advice. Apollo loves kids and helps them grow up healthy and strong. He even protects whole towns and their laws. Plus, he's super good-looking!
title: Apollo
